events.name: Memphis Tigers at Wake Forest Demon Deacons

headlines.description: Jamie Newman ran for a 1-yard touchdown with 34 seconds left to cap a big performance and Wake Forest's comeback in a 37-34 victory over Memphis in the Birmingham Bowl on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newman leads Wake Forest past Memphis 37-34 in bowl comeback

video.headline: Memphis' missed FG seals Birmingham Bowl for Wake Forest

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Memphis’ missed FG seals Birmingham Bowl for Wake Forest) 2018/12/22 ESHEET

events.name: Houston Cougars at Army Black Knights

headlines.description: Army routed Houston by 56 points in Saturday's Armed Forces Bowl, tying the FBS record for largest margin of victory in a bowl game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Army ties bowl blowout record in 56-point rout

headlines.description: Sawyer Smith threw for 320 yards and four touchdowns, B.J. Smith and Sidney Davis ran for touchdowns and Troy beat Buffalo 42-32 in the Dollar General Bowl on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Smith's 4 TDs lead Troy over Buffalo 42-32 in Dollar General

events.name: Hawai'i Rainbow Warriors at Louisiana Tech Bulldogs

headlines.description: J'Mar Smith threw one touchdown pass and ran for another in a big third quarter to lead Louisiana Tech to a 31-14 win over Hawaii in the Hawaii Bowl on Saturday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Smith leads Louisiana Tech past Hawaii 31-14 in Hawaii Bowl

video.headline: Dancy takes off for 58-yard LA Tech TD
